definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: In this article, atom-pairs of compounds, which include abundant three-dimensional information of molecules, were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 采用原子对空间距离法表征化合物的三维结构信息。

sentences.english: Copper methanesulfonate is synthesized and characterized by TGA and FTIR.
sentences.chinese: 合成了甲烷磺酸铜，用热重和红外对其进行表征。

sentences.english: The powder and the composite emulsion were characterized by FTIR.
sentences.chinese: 用FTIR对粉体和苯丙复合乳液进行了表征。

sentences.english: The carbon atomic charge(Qc) on C-O bond described the structural differences among the isomers of aliphatic alcohols and was easy to obtain .
sentences.chinese: 容易获取，表征了醇分子同分异构体之间的结构差异。

sentences.english: This paper briefly reviewed the structure characterization and its methods of random copolymer of propylene.
sentences.chinese: 综述了丙烯无规共聚物的结构表征方法及其结果。

sentences.english: The obtained value of heterogeneous index with entropy weight method can quantitatively reflect the heterogeneity of reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 熵权非均质指数的大小能定量表征储层的非均质性。

sentences.english: It is classically presented with continuous urinary incontinence, but a normal voiding pattern after successful toilet training.
sentences.chinese: 它的典型表征是有正常排尿型态但却持续的尿失禁。

sentences.english: This is still characterized the spirit of this county, also has tourist value.
sentences.chinese: 此仍足以表征本县的精神风貌，亦十分具有观光价值。

sentences.english: The Korean articles introduced to China in Song Dynasty were one of the tokens.
sentences.chinese: 宋时高丽物品源源向中国输入，就是其表征之一。

sentences.english: As the token of Buddhist Wisdom, Manjusri is the symbol of oriental wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 文殊表征了佛教智慧的核心，乃东方智慧的象征。

sentences.english: Eleven-shape coding can effectively indicate the trait of Chinese character.
sentences.chinese: 十一形码编码方法能够表征汉字的本质特征。

sentences.english: NMR and FTIR were used to characterize the structure of terminal groups of the copolyethers.
sentences.chinese: 利用核磁共振法表征了双丁基聚醚的端基结构。

sentences.english: Among them relatively typical token, be " Martian article " use wantonly .
sentences.chinese: 其中较为典型的表征，是“火星文”的大肆使用。

sentences.english: The air humidity is an important parameter which characterizes the atmospheres state.
sentences.chinese: 空气湿度是表征大气物理状态的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: The average diameter and the diameter distribution of electrospinning nanofibers were measured experimentally by using scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 纳米纤维的平均直径和直径分布用扫描电镜表征。

sentences.english: For Sorrell, that lack of control is symptomatic of the new world.
sentences.chinese: 对索雷尔来说，缺乏控制就是新世界的表征。

definition: in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
